name: Ballantine's Ballantine's Blended Scotch Whiskey - 750 Ml.
product_detail: Here you are an exclusive Blended Scotch Whisky: Ballantine's Christmas Reserve was created to celebrate the spirit of Christmas. It is a limited edition with intense fruity, caramel and sherry notes, making it ideal to enjoy and share with friends and family during long Christmas dinners. Shop from a Huge Collection - Enjoy Shopping Best Offers & Deals Online from Jumia Kenya - Receive at your doorstep - Fast Delivery  - Secure mode of Payment Produced by Ballantine's distillery, one of the most renowned in the world, this very special Scottish malt whisky is aged in ex-Sherry casks for 21 years, during which it develops a great aromatic richness. The particular and refined design of the bottle, different from the iconic "brick" of Ballantine's Finest, makes it an ideal gift for whisky lovers. Try Ballantine's Christmas Reserve neat, in cocktails or as an ingredient for many desserts. Ballantine's is one of the most popular brands of Blended Scotch Whiskies, the second best selling in the world. The blend at the base of the brand's products is composed of 50 Single Malts - of which the "soul" are those coming from the Miltonduff and Glenburgie distilleries - and 4 Grain Whiskies, which together create a quality and extremely versatile drink. Ballantine's Christmas Reserve TASTING NOTES:  Color: Very intense dark gold, tending to amber. Aroma: Deep, penetrating aromas of fruit cake and raisins, with a background of caramelized sweet apples and soft ripe pears. Taste: Sweet and very soft entrance, with a slightly viscous consistency. Delicious fruit flavors emerge on the palate, including orange, intertwined with notes of honey, malt, spices and a light touch of smoke. The finish is long and round.  PRODUCER: George Ballantine and Son It is considered the second best-selling brand of Scotch whisky in the world. The distillery was founded in 1827 in Edinburgh by George Ballantine, owner of a small food and drink shop. In 2005, it was acquired by the Pernod Ricard group. COUNTRY: Scotland PRODUCTION DETAILS: This is a limited edition created by the famous Master Blender Sandy Hyslop, who has created a whisky that evokes the spirit of Christmas. It is produced from a blend of various malt and cereal whiskies, including those from Miltonduff and Glenburgie. It matures in oak casks previously used to age Sherry, hence its fruity character. ALCOHOL: 40%

name: FITNE Chrysanthemum Flavor Instant Herbal Tea
product_detail: Teabag Fitne Chrysanthemum Flavor Instant Herbal TeaTeabag Fitne Chrysanthemum Flavor Instant Herbal Tea is a delightful blend of premium chrysanthemum flowers expertly crafted into convenient tea bags for a soothing and refreshing herbal tea experience. Each sip offers a burst of floral aroma and a light, crisp taste that is perfect for any time of the day.How to Use Chrysanthemum tea 1. Boil water and let it cool slightly.2. Place a Teabag Fitne Chrysanthemum Flavor Instant Herbal Tea bag in a cup.3. Pour the hot water over the tea bag.4. Let it steep for 3-5 minutes.5. Remove the tea bag and enjoy your aromatic chrysanthemum herbal tea.Benefits of Chrysanthemum tea 1. Relaxation: Chrysanthemum is known for its calming properties, making this tea ideal for unwinding after a long day.2. Digestive Aid: The herbal blend in this tea can help support digestion and soothe the stomach.3. Antioxidant Boost: Chrysanthemum is rich in antioxidants that can help protect the body from oxidative stress.4.Immune Support: Regular consumption of chrysanthemum tea may help strengthen the immune system.Frequently asked questions about Chrysanthemum tea 1. Is chrysanthemum tea good for skin?  Chrysanthemum tea is rich in antioxidants that can help promote healthy skin by fighting free radicals and reducing inflammation.  2. Can I drink chrysanthemum tea every day?  Yes, chrysanthemum tea is safe to drink daily. However, moderation is key as excessive consumption may lead to side effects. 3. Does chrysanthemum tea have caffeine?  Chrysanthemum tea is naturally caffeine-free, making it a great choice for those looking for a soothing beverage without the stimulating effects of caffeine. 4. Can I add sweeteners to chrysanthemum tea?  While chrysanthemum tea has a naturally sweet and floral taste, you can add honey or a sweetener of your choice to enhance the flavor according to your preference. 5. Is chrysanthemum tea good for allergies?  Chrysanthemum tea may help alleviate allergy symptoms due to its anti-inflammatory properties, but it's always best to consult with a healthcare professional for personalized advice.

name: Mama Earth Black Pepper (Whole) - For Weight Loss,Smooth Skin &Anticancer.
product_detail: Black pepper, also known as the king of spices, has a load of health benefits and a major benefit of consuming pepper is that it aids in weight loss. It is also said to be good for digestion and prevents cancer by detoxifying the body. When this spice is added to the food, it makes your food taste better and spicier.Here are some benefits of Mama Earth’s black pepper:To prevent cancer: The piperine in black pepper can be credited with the prevention of cancer, and becomes twice as potent when combined with turmeric.The spice also has vitamin C, vitamin A, flavonoids, carotene and other anti-oxidants that help remove harmful free radicals and protect the body from cancers and diseases.Stimulates digestion: the piperine in black pepper eases digestion and stimulates the stomach, which then secretes more hydrochloric acid that helps to digest proteins in food.So a bit of pepper in food will actually help you to digest it faster.Relieves cold and cough: Black pepper is antibacterial in nature, and therefore helps to cure cold and cough.It also helps to alleviate chest congestion, often caused due to pollution, flu, or a viral infection.Enables weight loss: You might not want to believe this, but black pepper is brilliant when it comes to extracting nutrients from food.And its outermost layer contains phytonutrients, which helps to break down fat cells, and also increases metabolism.If you eat fresh pepper, and begin to perspire, that's the pepper helping your body to get rid of excess water and toxins.Improves skin: It enables blood circulation and provides the skin with more oxygen. Adding it to your food also takes care of unwarranted skin wrinkles. Black pepper is known to help in the cure of Vitiligo, a condition where the skin loses pigmentation and creates white patches.Addresses depression: Piperine in black pepper helps to deal with depression. It stimulates the brain and helps it to function properly by making it more activeHow to useThe use of black pepper in food is limitless.This spice can be added to almost any savoury.May it be hot or cold, this spice can be sprinkled over these dishes to spice it up.Therefore, invest in a good pepper mill, and keep it on the table — you never know when you might need it.

product_detail: Introducing Mama Earth's Roasted Pumpkin Seeds – Nature's Nutrient Powerhouse!  Sourced from the finest organic pumpkin seeds, these little wonders pack a punch of flavor and nutrition that will elevate your snacking experience to a whole new level.   Here are some of the incredible Benefits of Mama Earth’s Roasted Pumpkin Seeds:  1.      Rich in Essential Nutrients:   These roasted pumpkin seeds are a nutritional treasure trove, loaded with vital nutrients like magnesium, zinc, iron, and potassium.   Nourish your body with the goodness it deserves.  2.      Improves Heart Health:   The high magnesium content in these seeds supports cardiovascular health by promoting healthy blood pressure levels and assisting in the maintenance of a regular heartbeat.  3. Enhances Gut Health:   The fiber content supports a healthy digestive system by aiding in regular bowel movements and fostering a balanced gut microbiome.  6.      Mood Enhancement:   Pumpkin seeds contain tryptophan, an amino acid that contributes to the production of serotonin, the "feel-good" neurotransmitter, promoting positive mood and relaxation.  7.      Bone Health:   Abundant in magnesium, phosphorus, and iron, these seeds contribute to maintaining strong bones and reducing the risk of osteoporosis.  8.      Skin Radiance:   The antioxidants present in these seeds help combat oxidative stress, promoting healthy skin and a natural glow.  9. Antioxidant Defense:   With a rich blend of antioxidants like vitamin E and carotenoids, these seeds aid in neutralizing free radicals and reducing the risk of chronic diseases.  12.   Diabetes Support:   The magnesium content assists in maintaining healthy blood sugar levels, making these seeds a smart choice for those looking to manage their blood glucose.  13. name: Icon 10CS Long Lasting Mosquitos Insecticide
product_detail: PRODUCT INFORMATIONIcon 10CS has been designed for use in indoor residual spraying and provides greater than 9 months control of mosquitoes and other public health pests.Get ICON 10CS for indoor use against mosquitoes, flies, flea, and spiders. Suitable for indoor use, its residual effect is close to 12 months.Icon 10CSKill mosquitos instantly with Icon 10CS. An insecticide that has been specially made for indoor usage. It is technically an advanced capsule suspension [CS] formulation of the second generation pyrethroid, Lamdba-cyhalothrin. It has a toxic effect on the control and elimination of many insects such as mosquitos, flies, fleas, and spiders. Only low rates of Icon 10SC are required for active results. Has long-lasting residual control for close to 12 months. Active IngredientLambda-cyhalothrin  Lambda-cyhalothrin Mode of ActionIt is in Chemical family Pyrethroid and affects an organisms’ nervous system. It disintegrates the gating mechanism of sodium channels that are very vital for nerve impulse generation and conduct. Pyrethroids delay the process of closing the sodium channel activation gates keeping them open for too long. This results to delayed excitation of an insects’ nerve fibers causing rapid paralysis and death of the insect upon ingestion or external exposure.Target PestsFliesMosquitosFleasSpidersAntsTicksRate of ApplicationLambda-cyhalothrin release rate of the capsule stays optimized in order to boost insect pick up and residual efficacy. Therefore, small rates as low as one capsule for one mosquito are required.Important Reasons Why Icon 10SC is Your First Choice InsecticideIt has a long-term residue effect of close to 12 months. A single application is enough for one year and it stays effective even during rainy seasons.  It has proven effective and efficient for Malaria control programs. Recommended for household usage as it is odorless and leaves no stains behind.It has a long term residual effect that lasts up to 12 months.Saves you the trouble of measuring as it comes in accurately patented unit dose sachets. Has been recommended by the World Health Organization [WHO]
